column1: Uchi////My husband and I have lived in Houston 4 years and love eating out and exploring the Houston food scene. After the bajillions of places we have eaten at
column2: Uchi is still our favorite. Every time. We just love
column4: love Uchi happy hour. Everything always delicious
column5: wait staff super friendly and knowledgeable
column6: atmosphere fun. $3 Sapporo! We recently celebrated my husband's birthday here and loved it all over again. Can't wait for our next visit!
